subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth and Patrick Reed helped give the United States a lead after the morning session, but were benched in the afternoon, when Europe dominated to take a 5-3 lead.
snippet: Jordan Spieth and Patrick Reed helped give the United States a lead after the morning session, but were benched in the afternoon, when Europe dominated to take a 5-3 lead.
